name: Tale of a Brave Shroom
description:
In this game you play as a brave boletus who gets from the King of the Mushroom Kingdom, quest to kill the traitor. This traitor, known as Borovikus, is your friend. What will win? Loyalty to the king or friendship. You will have to fight evil mushrooms and overcome numerous arcade challenges to find out. See for yourself.

The game is a tribute to old platform games that skilfully combined arcade challenges with combat. What is't new in our game? Time manipulations skills. Yes you are shroom who can stop time. Amazing!

Game works on own engine created by using Monogame framework. We don't use any ready assets.  Everything you can see, hear or feel is prepared by us.

Created by:

Olgierd "Nordtraveller" Jaros,

Kinga Mirkiewicz,

Piotr Morawski,

Aneta Wiśniewska,

Marcin Styczeń
